articles.title: Kim Jong Il Participates in Voting
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Participates in Voting
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Sunday inspected Kim Il Sung Political University and participated in the election of deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly together with servicepersons. 
					When he arrived at the university, teachers and students and their families enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest glory and the warmest thanks to him. 
					
					After warmly acknowledging their enthusiastic welcome, he moved to the festively decorated polling station. There he received a ballot from the chairman of the Election Committee of Sub-Constituency No. 22 of Constituency No. 342 for the election of deputy to the SPA and voted for KPA officer Jon Il, candidate for deputy to the SPA.
					
					He met and had a talk with the candidate.
					
					After his voting, he went round the room devoted to the history of the university, conducted by its rector. 
					
					Looking back with deep emotion on the glorious path covered by the university, he noted that thanks to the wise leadership and meticulous care of President Kim Il Sung the university developed into a prestigious centre for training hard core officers of the army, adding that it is great pride and honor of the WPK and people to have such university.
					
					He highly appreciated the shining feats performed by the university in the past period, saying that it has trained many able political officers over the past more than six decades since its foundation, greatly contributing to strengthening and developing the revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					Then he made the rounds of an e-library, a servicepersons' hall and other places to acquaint himself with the education there. 
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the university has created a good educational environment and made an effective use of it in order to train all students into able political officers and praised the teachers for having devoted their wisdom and energies to training commanding officers. 
					
					He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines in the education and management of the university, saying that the position and role of the university are very important for improving and intensifying the political work of the party in the People's Army as required by the era of Songun. 
					
					He expressed great expectation and conviction that the teachers of the university would bring about a new turn in the education and thus train many more political officers strong in the party spirit and comprehensively qualified. He had a photo session with them. 
					
					He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces of the NDC of the DPRK, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Department of the KPA, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk and Hyon Chol Hae and other KPA commanding officers.

articles.title: KPA Servicepersons Participate in Voting
articles.content:
KPA Servicepersons Participate in Voting
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army participated in the voting for electing General Secretary Kim Jong Il deputy to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly, at Constituency No. 333.
					Voting started at polling stations at 9 a.m.
					
					Participating in the election were Jo Myong Rok, first vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, Ri Yong Mu and O Kuk Ryol, vice-chairmen of the NDC of the DPRK, Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Il Chol, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Marshal Ri Ul Sol and KPA Vice Marshals Ri Jong San, Ri Ha Il, Pak Ki So, Jon Jae Son and Jang Song U.
					
					Servicepersons looked back with deep emotion on the long journey made by the great Songun brilliant commander with loving care and cast ballots, expressing gratitude and trust in him. 
					
					Servicepersons who participated in voting at sub-constituencies Nos. 28, 31, 19 and 33 renewed their firm determination to make a long journey of the Songun revolution, upholding Kim Jong Il with arms.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Go to Polls
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Go to Polls
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials of the DPRK went to sub-constituencies across the country on Sunday to join the voters there in the election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yong Ju, Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Jung Rin, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Chol Man, Kim Yong Dae and Ryu Mi Yong, voted for candidates for deputies to the SPA at relevant sub-constituencies.
					
					They met and encouraged the voters who have devotedly worked for the revolutionary cause of Songun and prosperity of the DPRK. And they expressed belief that the voters would continue to discharge their duties as citizens of the DPRK in the gigantic drive to cement the state and social system of the DPRK and bring about fresh innovations and create a fresh speed of advance.

articles.title: Election of Deputies to SPA under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Election of Deputies to SPA under Way in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly is taking place in the DPRK on Sunday.
					All the voters are going to the polls to consolidate the people's power as firm as a rock, according to a report of the Central Election Committee.
					
					As of noon 71.4 percent of those registered on the lists of voters have participated in voting.
					
					Overseas citizens of the DPRK staying in the homeland are also taking part in voting according to their wishes.

articles.title: Election of Deputies to SPA Goes on
articles.content:
Election of Deputies to SPA Goes on
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK is going on at the constituencies across the country.
					As of 14:00 on Sunday, 93.1 percent of those registered on the lists of voters went to the polls, according to a report of the Central Election Committee.
					
					Those voters unable to go to the polling stations because of old age or illness are casting their ballots into the mobile ballot boxes.

articles.title: All Voters Participate in Voting
articles.content:
All Voters Participate in Voting
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- All voters registered on the lists of voters participated in voting at all constituencies across the country for the election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly as of 18:00 Sunday except those staying in foreign countries or working in oceans, according to a report of the Central Election Committee.
					Overseas citizens staying in the homeland also took part in voting according to their wishes.
					
					Those voters unable to go to the polling stations because of old age or illness cast their ballots into the mobile ballot boxes.

articles.title: All Citizens Called upon to Turn out in Election
articles.content:
All Citizens Called upon to Turn out in Election
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Sunday run editorials on the day of the election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					An editorial of Rodong Sinmun says that the election of deputies to the SPA to be held today offers an important occasion of demonstrating the might of the DPRK's single-minded unity which has been consolidated in the course of the Songun revolution and solidity and advantages of Korean-style socialism and further increasing the function and role of the people's power.
					
					It goes on:
					
					It is the true picture of our single-minded unity that all the servicepersons and people follow their leader only, reposing absolute trust in him, and share idea, will, destiny and future with the headquarters of the revolution. Our single-minded unity is unbreakable and more powerful than a nuclear weapon.
					
					Korean-style socialism is the best socialism in the world as it is centered on the popular masses. The people of the DPRK keenly realize how grateful the above-said socialism is as the days go by. They regard socialism as their life and soul. It is the unanimous desire and will of the army and people of the DPRK to defend and glorify Korean-style socialism to the last under the uplifted banner of Songun in any storm and stress. 
					
					The people's power organizes the work to help the people display their creative ability and intensify their activities and plays the role of a master taking care of their living in a responsible manner. 
					
					The candidates for deputies registered at all constituencies across the country have devotedly worked for the country and people true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il. 
					
					When all the citizens participate in the election of deputies as one and vote for the candidates, the government of the DPRK will grow remarkably stronger and the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a great prosperous and powerful nation will become a brilliant reality.
					
					An editorial of Minju Joson calls on all citizens to turn out in the above-said election as one to make a positive contribution to consolidating the state social system as firm as a rock and reinforcing the people's power and thus demonstrate once again to the world the dignity and might of the DPRK advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the State Merited Chorus together with servicepersons in connection with the opening of the Pulgunbyol Theatre.
					He first went round the Pulgunbyol Theatre, a building which has been constructed by rebuilding an annex to the Ponghwa Art Theatre.
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the construction of another splendid modern theatre having all facilities.
					
					Then he enjoyed an art performance given by the State Merited Chorus in connection with the opening of the Pulgunbyol Theatre.
					
					The repertoire of the performers included male choruses "Please Receive Our Salute", "Forest Is Swaying" and "Wind Howls from Mt. Paektu " and male solos and male choruses "My Home Village" and "The 2,000-ri Amnok River".
					
					Through the performance the artistes sang high praises of the proud course of the Songun revolution shining with victory and glory and truthfully represented the unshakable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation without fail under the uplifted banner of the great Songun.
					
					The revolutionary and militant performance deeply impressed the audience as it powerfully demonstrated the great vitality of the WPK's policy on Songun music.
					
					Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the State Merited Chorus gave a splendid performance fully reflecting the faith and will of the DPRK and the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					He expressed great expectation and conviction that all the artistes of the chorus would conduct dynamic revolutionary performing activities in the future, too, and thus greatly encourage the army and people to wage fresh struggles and perform feats and give full play to the might of the buglers for the Songun revolution and a militant art unit.
					
					Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces of the NDC of the DPRK, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the KPA General Political Department, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk and Hyon Chol Hae and other commanding officers of the army, Pak Myong Chol, councilor of the NDC of the DPRK, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C.C., WPK, and other senior cadres.

articles.title: Spokesman for Foreign Ministry on Peaceful Settlement of Darfur Issue
articles.content:
Spokesman for Foreign Ministry on Peaceful Settlement of Darfur Issue
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK Sunday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA in connection with the International Criminal Court's issue of an arrest warrant for the Sudanese president:
					The International Criminal Court on March 4 issued an arrest warrant for the Sudanese president on the suspicion of committing crimes against humanity and war crimes in the area of Darfur in Sudan.
					
					The court's decision to arrest the head of state who was legitimately elected with the support of the Sudanese people is arousing the deep concern of the international community as it is an unheard-of wanton encroachment upon the sovereignty of a sovereign state.
					
					The Darfur issue is an internal issue of Sudan and it is, therefore, not a matter which allows foreign forces to interfere in it and settle it by hurting the dignity of the Sudanese people.
					
					It is a super-state act to lord it over sovereign states and freely interfere in their internal affairs in disregard of their sovereignty. Such practice will only disturb the stability of the international relations and wreck the world peace.
					
					The Darfur issue should be settled in a peaceful way on the principle of respecting the sovereignty of the Sudanese people.

articles.title: Growth of Progressive Forces Called for in S, Korea
articles.content:
Growth of Progressive Forces Called for in S, Korea
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea held its general meeting in Seoul on March 4 and announced its action program for this year.
					At the meeting speakers said that the intensive candlelight actions last year helped rapidly rally and strengthen the forces against Lee Myung Bak, thus providing the motive force capable of opening up a new era of the progressive movement.
					
					Setting it as its action goal for this year to build a people's front against Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party", the organization will expand and strengthen itself and conduct its brisk activities across south Korea, they stressed.
					
					They said that, for the present, the organization would concentrate its efforts on the struggle to punish the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the GNP and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Struggle to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting in Seoul on March 3 at which it declared that it would struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					At the meeting speakers said that the inter-Korean relations have been further deteriorated owing to the authorities' policy of confrontation, adding that the workers will take the lead in the struggle to tide over the present crisis.
					
					They declared that they would wage a vigorous struggle to defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and thus achieve the peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula and glorify the June 15 era of independent reunification.
					
					On the same day, the KCTU made public a statement denouncing the puppet education authorities for their unreasonable behavior against the former chief vice-chairman of the KCTU.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A lecture and a seminar were held in Dominica and a lecture, a reading session, a photo exhibition and a ceremony for donating books in Nigeria between Feb. 13 and 25 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					On display in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos showing the feats of Kim Jong Il and pictures introducing the looks of the developing DPRK.
					
					Aba Sadik Abubakr, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, said in his lecture that Kim Jong Il is the prominent leader guiding the Korean people along the road of victory with his rare leadership art. Under his leadership the DPRK is fully displaying its dignity and might in the international arena, the lecturer stressed.
					
					Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, said at the reading session on "Biography of Comrade Kim Jong Il" that the world progressive mankind is highly praising his enormous feats for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event held in Dominica.

articles.title: Projected U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Condemned in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Projected U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Condemned in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association issued a statement on Mar. 3 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces for their projected joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					The statement noted that the association scathingly condemns the said DPRK-targeted large-scale war exercises to be staged by the U.S. and south Korea across south Korea from March 9.
					
					The provocative war exercises are incompatible with dialogue in any case and can be justified with nothing as they are a dangerous action for a war designed to render the regional situation strained and destroy the process of peace and reconciliation in the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					All the facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces are the mastermind of wrecking the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The association strongly demands that the U.S. put an end to its hostile policy towards the DPRK, immediately stop the military exercises in south Korea and withdraw all its armed forces for aggression including the weapons of mass destruction at once if it truly wants the detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The statement expressed full support for the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Treacherous Crimes Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Treacherous Crimes Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Voronezh Region of the Russian Federation made public a statement on March 4 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its treacherous anti-reunification crimes.
					The statement condemned the deeds conducted by the Lee group during the first year of its office as the most disgraceful and never-to-be-condoned hideous crime in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					The inter-Korean relations can never be improved and the situation of the Korean Peninsula will get more strained with each passing day as long as such sycophantic quislings and anti-reunification elements as Lee Myung Bak are allowed to stay in power in south Korea, it warned.
					
					It stressed that the United Confederation of Koreans in Voronezh Region and compatriots will wage a vigorous struggle to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona academia militar y participa en votacion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona academia militar y participa en votacion
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el dia 8 la Academia Militar Politica  Kim Il Sung y participo en las elecciones de los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					Cuando el llego a la academia, los profesores, empleados, estudiantes y familiares le acogieron hospitalariamente rindiendole el maximo honor y expresandole el mas calido agradecimiento.
					
					Tras responder cordialmente al saludo de ellos, el Dirigente se dirigio al lugar de votacion adornado en colores de fiesta.
					
					Recibio la boleta de parte del presidente del comite del subdistrito No. 22 del distrito electoral No. 342 para las elecciones de diputados a la APS y la voto a favor del candidato al diputado a la APS, Jon Il, quien es oficial del EPC.
					
					El Dirigente departio con el candidato.
					
					Tras realizar la votacion, el Dirigente recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial de la academia guiado por el rector.
					
					Luego de recordar con profunda emocion la trayectoria llena de glorias recorrida por el plantel docente, dijo que bajo la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, ello pudo convertirse en la poderosa base de formacion de cuadros medulares del EPC y continuo que esta academia es un gran orgullo de nuestro partido y pueblo.
					
					Aprecio altamente los brillantes meritos acumulados en el pasado por la academia destacando que durante mas de 60 anos desde su fundacion, ella hizo enorme contribucion al fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias al formar a numerosos funcionarios politicos competentes.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en la biblioteca electronica, la casa de los militares y otros lugares cerciorandose del estado de la ensenanza y educacion.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que el plantel docente preparo el magnifico ambiente pedagogico para formar a todos los estudiantes como competentes funcionarios politicos y lo aprovecha eficazmente, reconocio los esfuerzos de los profesores y empleados quienes dedican toda su inteligencia y pasion a la formacion de los oficiales de mando.
					
					Subrayando que son muy importantes la posicion y el papel de la citada academia para mejorar la labor politica del partido en el EPC conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la ensenanza y educacion del plantel.
					
					Se fotografio junto con los profesores y empleados de la academia expresando gran esperanza y conviccion de que ellos produciran un nuevo viraje en la pedagogia para formar a muchos funcionarios politicos con gran partidismo y preparados multilateralmente.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares del CDN de la RPDC, vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk y Hyon Chol Hae, y otros miembros directivos del ejercito.

articles.title: Elecciones de diputados a la APS de la RPDC
articles.content:
Elecciones de diputados a la APS de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- El dia 8, tienen lugar las elecciones de los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun la informacion del Comite Electoral Central para dichas elecciones, todos los electores participan como un solo hombre en la votacion para fortalecer monoliticamente el Poder Popular.
					
					Hasta las doce, el 71.4 por ciento de los electores registrado en las listas de votantes participo en las elecciones.
					
					Tambien, los coreanos en ultramar quienes permanecen en la patria estan presentes en la votacion segun sus deseos.

articles.title: Continuan las elecciones de los diputados en Corea
articles.content:
Continuan las elecciones de los diputados en Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- Siguen efectuandose en todos los distritos electorales del pais las elecciones de los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun la informacion del Comite Electoral Central, hasta las 14 del dia 8 participo en la votacion el 93.1 por ciento de todos los electores registrados en las listas de votantes.
					
					Los electores quienes por la vejez o enfermedad no pueden ir a los lugares para la eleccion votan en las urnas moviles.

articles.title: Informacion del Comite Electoral Central
articles.content:
Informacion del Comite Electoral Central
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- Segun informo el Comite Electoral Central para las elecciones de diputados a la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hasta las 18 del dia 8, todos los electores registrados en las listas de votantes, con excepcion a los que estan en el extranjero o trabajan en alta mar, participaron en la votacion en todos los distritos electorales del pais.
					Tambien, los ciudadanos residentes en ultramar, que permanecen ahora en la patria, estuvieron presentes en el sufragio segun sus deseos.
					
					Los electores, que no pudieron acudir al lugar de votacion por ser demasiado ancianos o enfermos, votaron en las urnas moviles.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion inaugural del Teatro Pulgunbyol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion inaugural del Teatro Pulgunbyol
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC, presencio la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito dedicada a la inauguracion del Teatro Pulgunbyol.
					Ante todo, el Dirigente recorrio el teatro, que se construyo remodelando un edificio anexo del Teatro de Arte Ponghwa.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho por la construccion de otro magnifico y moderno teatro que dispone de todas las instalaciones.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente vio ahi la funcion inaugural del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					
					En la escena fueron interpretados los coros masculinos "!Que reciba el saludo!", "Se agita el bosque" y "Sopla el viento del monte Paektu" y los solos y coros masculinos "Mi tierra natal", "Dos mil ries del rio Amnok" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves del espectaculo, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico de la orgullosa trayectoria de la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar), coronada con victorias y glorias, y manifestaron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de llevar a feliz termino, cueste lo que cueste, las causas de la revolucion del Juche y de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera bajo la grandiosa bandera del Songun.
					
					La funcion revolucionaria y combativa, que devino una muestra contundente de la gran vitalidad de la politica del PTC sobre la musica del Songun, dejo profundamente impresionados a los espectadores.
					
					El Dirigente se puso muy contento de que los artistas de la citada banda ofrecieron esta magnifica funcion, en que palpitan la conviccion y la voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion  de que todos los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito seguiran desplegando resueltamente sus revolucionarias actividades artisticas para estimular activamente al ejercito y al pueblo a la nueva lucha y a la creacion de nuevas proezas, de modo que fuera manifestado plenamente el poderio del trompetero de la revolucion del Songun y del destacamento artistico combativo.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares del CDN de la RPDC, vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk y Hyon Chol Hae, y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el consejero del CDN de la RPDC, Pak Myong Chol, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il, y otros cuadros directivos.

articles.title: MINREX demanda solucion pacifica del problema de Darfur
articles.content:
MINREX demanda solucion pacifica del problema de Darfur
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- En la rueda de prensa sostenida este domingo con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea con motivo de la emision de la orden de arresto sobre el presidente de Sudan por parte de la Corte Penal Internacional, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia 4, la CPI emitio la orden de arresto contra el presidente de Sudan bajo la sospecha de que el cometio en la zona de Darfur de ese pais los crimenes de lesa humanidad y de guerra.
					
					El intento de arrestar al jefe de Estado elegido legitimamente con el apoyo del pueblo sudanes constituye una flagrante e inaudita violacion de la soberania de un Estado independiente, de la cual esta muy preocupada la sociedad internacional.
					
					El problema de Darfur es un asunto interno de Sudan que no sera resuelto mediante la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y la violacion de la dignidad del pueblo sudanes.
					
					Las acciones supranacionales de despreciar la soberania de los Estados independientes e intervenir a su antojo en sus asuntos internos poniendose por encima de ellos rompen la estabilidad de las relaciones internacionales y perturban la paz mundial.
					
					El problema de Darfur debe resolverse por via pacifica en el principio de respetar la soberania del pueblo sudanes.
